titlepage.titleproper: Guide to Anton Friedrich Freiherr von Tröltsch, Ohrenheilkunde1800s
titlepage.author: Finding aid prepared by SCRC

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Tröltsch, Anton Friedrich, Freiherr von. Ohrenheilkunde

address.addressline: Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center

did.abstract: Manuscript, informal lecture notes in German, from Tröltsch's medical lectures on the ear. Illustrated with sketches. Bound in modern half cloth over marbled paper. Former call number 617.802 N001. No Crerar accession number.

prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: When quoting material from this collection, the preferred citation is: Tröltsch, Anton Friedrich, Freiherr von, Ohrenheilkunde, Crerar Ms 71, Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center, University of Chicago Library

scopecontent.head: Scope Note
scopecontent.p: Holograph, informal lecture notes in German, from Tröltsch's medical lectures on the ear. Illustrated with sketches. Bound in modern half cloth over marbled paper. Former call number 617.802 N001. No Crerar accession number.

relatedmaterial.p: The following related resources are located in the Department of Special Collections:
